languages.text: {n}Кассия шепчет с завороженным ужасом:{/n} "Его душа блеклая, почти бесцветная, но в нее просочились чуждые цвета. Немыслимые и безумные... И они пришли извне".
{n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия шепчет с завороженным ужасом:{/n} "Его душа блеклая, почти бесцветная, но в нее просочились чуждые цвета. Немыслимые и безумные... И они пришли извне".

{n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

languages.text: {n}Cassia susurra con un terror hipnótico:{/n} «Su alma es pálida, casi incolora, pero los colores alienígenas han penetrado en ella. Es impensable, demencial... vienen del exterior, sin duda».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia susurra con un terror hipnótico:{/n} «Su alma es pálida, casi incolora, pero los colores alienígenas han penetrado en ella. Es impensable, demencial... vienen del exterior, sin duda».

languages.text: {n}恐怖に襲われたカッシアは囁いた。{/n}「彼の魂は青白く、ほとんど無色だが、異質な色合いが染み付いている。想像を絶する狂気…そして、それは外部からもたらされたものなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

traits.locale_text: {n}恐怖に襲われたカッシアは囁いた。{/n}「彼の魂は青白く、ほとんど無色だが、異質な色合いが染み付いている。想像を絶する狂気…そして、それは外部からもたらされたものなのです」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅惊恐地低声说道。{/n}“这个人的灵魂是苍白的，几乎没有任何色彩。然而，异形的色彩已经渗入其中，不可思议、充满疯狂……这些颜色是从外界来的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅惊恐地低声说道。{/n}“这个人的灵魂是苍白的，几乎没有任何色彩。然而，异形的色彩已经渗入其中，不可思议、充满疯狂……这些颜色是从外界来的。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia flüstert mit gebanntem Entsetzen:{/n} "Seine Seele ist fahl, fast farblos, aber außerirdische Töne haben sie befallen. Unvorstellbar und krank ... und sie kamen von außen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia flüstert mit gebanntem Entsetzen:{/n} "Seine Seele ist fahl, fast farblos, aber außerirdische Töne haben sie befallen. Unvorstellbar und krank ... und sie kamen von außen."

languages.text: « Son âme est si pâle qu'elle en paraît incolore, {n}murmure Cassia avec une certaine horreur mêlée de fascination.{/n} Mais quelques teintes extraterrestres s'y sont infiltrées. C'est impensable, insensé même… Et elles viennent de l'extérieur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."

traits.locale_text: « Son âme est si pâle qu'elle en paraît incolore, {n}murmure Cassia avec une certaine horreur mêlée de fascination.{/n} Mais quelques teintes extraterrestres s'y sont infiltrées. C'est impensable, insensé même… Et elles viennent de l'extérieur. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, korkudan büyülenmiş bir hâlde fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ruhu solgun, neredeyse tüm renklerden yoksun. Fakat aşina olmadığım renk tonları ruhuna sızmış. Akla hayale sığmayan, delilik eseri renkler... Dışarıdan gelip ruhuna yerleşmişler."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia whispers in mesmerised horror,{/n} "His soul is pale, almost colourless, but alien hues have seeped into it. Unthinkable and insane... and they came from without."
